trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for XPS package serialization policies.
This class is abstract.
Packaging policy classes provide methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different types of parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.BasePackagingPolicy"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.

When overridden in a derived class, acquires an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> with a specified resource [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)].
The resource [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> resource stream to acquire.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] resource stream for the with the specified resourceID.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a list of strings, each expressing a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> element.
Use the list to compose `LinkTarget` elements that can be inserted into the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent.LinkTargets%2A?displayProperty=fullName>element for the corresponding page.
Wrap each string in the list in markup by using the following form:
`<LinkTarget Name=\"` *target name* `\" />`, where *target name* is the string.

For more information about the `<PageContent.LinkTargets>` and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> elements, see chapter 3 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IList`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.String"></xref> objects that represent the linkable targets for a page.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for the current page.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for the current page.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed document that is processing.
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> of the current document.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page that is processing.
The <xref href="System.Uri"></xref> of the current page.
When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.
This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
An object that provides information about how a print job prints.
When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.
When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to some internal or external resource.

For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
A name for the relationship.
When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to a font.

For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the font.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> object.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the resource that is released.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> object.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.
When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
